name: 2rexbii
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)))

stmt.origin: rexbii(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wb(wrex(s1, c1, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wb(wrex(s1, c1, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s1, c1, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wb(w0, w1)

comment: Inference adding two restricted existential quantifiers to both sides of an equivalence. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-1995.)
